scripts.package:firefox: npm run build:firefox && cd release/firefox && web-ext build
scripts.sign:firefox: npm run package:firefox && web-ext sign --source-dir release/firefox --api-key=${npm_config_AMO_JWT_ISSUER} --api-secret=${npm_config_AMO_JWT_SECRET}
scripts.run:firefox: npm run build:firefox && cd release/firefox && web-ext run
